annotations.description: It's the Holiday season and we all deserve Fancy Cocktails do we not? So today I bring you the Gin Punch AKA The Fancy Gin Punch. Gin Punch was the Gin drink...
annotations.title: Let's Have Fancy Gin Punch!

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Genever
1oz (30ml) Lemon Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Raspberry Syrup
2 Orange Wedges
1 Pineapple Wedge

Add juice, syrup, and fruit to shaker. 
Muddle and add genever. 
Shake and strain over pebble ice into collins glass. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J8A2kkh-N5I
title: Fancy Gin Punch
